means: 可保证的，可证明的，可确认的

word_mean: 法定的：指传染病而言，根据法律，传染病病例必须向卫生部门报告

entry.tran: 极不理智的;愚蠢透顶的
entry.def: If you describe someone as certifiable, you think that their behaviour is extremely unreasonable or foolish.

example.ex: ...if he can convince the committee that he is not certifiable.
example.tran: 如果他能够向委员会证明他没有丧失理智

means.word_mean: 1. fit to be certified as insane (and treated accordingly)
2. capable of being guaranteed or certified;

auth_sentence.content: Music to the ears of a certifiable arcticoholic like me.

auth_sentence.content: In my experience the more responsible posts in the army are largely filled by certifiable lunatics.
